title: ***ALL CARDS ARE SOLD***   T206's for Sale..pics of fronts and backs

posts.post_title: ***ALL CARDS ARE SOLD***   T206's for Sale..pics of fronts and backs
posts.post_content:
****I have decided to sell off these as singles due to the large request to do so.... But I will ask that with each sale you add $2 for shipping no matter how many cards you select.***** 

16 cards below all have newly reduced prices....

 please email me at [url]blunder19@aol.com[/url] if you have any questions.. 

All cards are T206's


Chance Port.. GD-VG SOLD
Easterly.. GD.. SOLD

[url]http://s251.photobucket.com/albums/gg309/blunder19/T206%20lot%20of%2050%20Fronts%20and%20Backs/[/url]

Thanks for looking
Jamie
forgot to say...All cards will come in their own tobacco toploader and sleeve
I'll take the Wilson, Eberfield and Leifield.  Pm sent as well.

Sorry if I was not clear above....

I am only interested in selling this as an entire lot. The value for each card was only for an interested buyer to see how I came up with the price for the total lot.

In most cases I listed what I paid for the cards as the value.. to sell them off 1 by 1.. especially on the lower cards..after shipping.. would mean I am selling below what I paid for them...

So only taking offers for the entire lot... sorry for any confusion.

Jamie

If you end up changing your mind I would be interested in the cards that depict the player in catcher's gear or with a catcher's mitt.  I think I saw 3 in total.

B
ditto...I'd be looking at 5 or so of the lower grade ones.

Finally got a chance to update the ones sold...

sorry for the delay

Jamie

remaining cards have been sold.... thanks Jason.


and thanks to everyone else who had purchased some of the cards...

Everything will be shipping out tomorrow (Friday) morning.
